hadiths.text: Narrated Salamah ibn al-Muhabbaq: A similar tradition (to the No. 4445) has also been transmitted by Salamah ibn al-Muhabbaq from the Prophet (ﷺ). This version has: If she asked her to have intercourse with her voluntarily, then she and a similar slave-girl would be given to her mistress from his property

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الرَّجُلِ يَزْنِي بِجَارِيَةِ امْرَأَتِهِ
chapter.eng-name: A man who commits zina with his wife's slave woman
